item.name: Channa Bhatura
item.description: Curried chick peas cooked with chopped onions and fresh herbs.

item.name: Shahi Paneer
item.description: Shahi paneer comes with raita, your choice of rice or naan, and a pop.

item.name: Vegetable Samosa
item.description: Deep-fried cone pastry stuffed with potatoes, and green peas.

item.name: Chicken Soup
item.description: Boneless chicken cooked in a wok with fresh herbs.

item.name: Chicken Korma
item.description: Stewed chicken cooked with traditional spices and crushed coconut and cashews.

item.name: Malai Kofta
item.description: Ground vegetables formed, fried, and cooked in a creamy tomato-based curry.
